name: Fill the Cup!
description:
Thank you for clicking on Fill the Cup!

This game was made with Anant Gupta and Luke Padmore for the NotUniversity Hacks Hackathon. 

This was a really fun and pleasant experience, and more importantly it was Anant and Luke's first game! 

Anant was in charge of Music and Level Design.

Luke was in charge of all the Art work.

And I was in charge of Programming and putting it all together in Unity.

There were many difficulties along the way due to having to work together through online only, we had to be in a call at all times and we had to make sure everyone was informed of what the others were doing  so that they could keep up to pace.

I learnt a lot about LineRenderers in Unity and will be defiitely be bringing them to some of my future games due to their versatility.

This is also my first time making a web version available! Please tell me if it works well!

A huge thanks to Anant and Luke for being with me for this project, and I hope you enjoy our game!
